languages.text: {n}Губернатор Медина медлит с ответом. Его лицо медленно наливается багровым цветом гнева.{/n} "Ваша Светлость..." {n}цедит он сквозь зубы.{/n} "Я знаю, кто вы. Я наслышан о вашем... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}"подвиге"{/d}. И я не позволю чужому лицу — пускай и иному Вольному Торговцу — разговаривать со мной в таком тоне и требовать что-то от подданного светлейшего Каллигоса Винтерскейла!" {n}Он переводит дух и продолжает более спокойным тоном.{/n} Тема закрыта. Более не будем о том".

{n}Governor Medineh hesitates before answering, his face slowly turning purple with anger.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}he grits out through his teeth.{/n} "I know who you are. I have heard of your... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}'exploits.'{/d} And I will not allow a stranger — let alone another Rogue Trader — to speak to me in such a manner and make demands of a subject of His Lordship Calligos Winterscale!" {n}He takes a breath and continues in a calmer tone,{/n} "The matter is closed. Let us speak no more of it."

И я не позволю чужому лицу — пускай и иному Вольному Торговцу — разговаривать со мной в таком тоне и требовать что-то от подданного светлейшего Каллигоса Винтерскейла!" {n}Он переводит дух и продолжает более спокойным тоном.{/n} Тема закрыта. Более не будем о том".

I have heard of your... 'exploits.' And I will not allow a stranger — let alone another Rogue Trader — to speak to me in such a manner and make demands of a subject of His Lordship Calligos Winterscale!" {n}He takes a breath and continues in a calmer tone,{/n} "The matter is closed. Let us speak no more of it."

I have heard of your... 'exploits.' And I will not allow a stranger — let alone another Rogue Trader — to speak to me in such a manner and make demands of a subject of His Lordship Calligos Winterscale!" {n}He takes a breath and continues in a calmer tone,{/n} "The matter is closed. Let us speak no more of it."

languages.text: {n}梅迪涅总督犹豫了片刻，整张脸气得发紫，之后开了口。{/n}“大人……”{n}他咬牙切齿。{/n}“我知道您是什么人，我也听说过您的那些所谓……‘{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}事迹{/d}’。我是卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔的臣民，我决不允许任何陌生人以这种方式对我说话，向我提要求！更不用说是另一位行商浪人！”{n}他吸了口气，以较为平静的语气继续开了口。{/n}“这件事情到此为止，我们不用再谈了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Medineh hesitates before answering, his face slowly turning purple with anger.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}he grits out through his teeth.{/n} "I know who you are. I have heard of your... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}'exploits.'{/d} And I will not allow a stranger — let alone another Rogue Trader — to speak to me in such a manner and make demands of a subject of His Lordship Calligos Winterscale!" {n}He takes a breath and continues in a calmer tone,{/n} "The matter is closed. Let us speak no more of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}梅迪涅总督犹豫了片刻，整张脸气得发紫，之后开了口。{/n}“大人……”{n}他咬牙切齿。{/n}“我知道您是什么人，我也听说过您的那些所谓……‘事迹’。我是卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔的臣民，我决不允许任何陌生人以这种方式对我说话，向我提要求！更不用说是另一位行商浪人！”{n}他吸了口气，以较为平静的语气继续开了口。{/n}“这件事情到此为止，我们不用再谈了。”

languages.text: {n}El gobernador Medineh titubea antes de responder. Su rostro, iracundo, enrojece hasta quedar morado.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}...». {n}Masculla apretando los dientes.{/n} «Sé quién es. He oído hablar de sus... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}"proezas"{/d}. ¡Pero no permitiré que un{mf||a} desconocid{mf|o|a}, por muy Comerciante Independiente que sea, me hable en ese tono y presente exigencias a un súbdito de mi señor Calligos Winterscale!». {n}Respira profundamente y, en tono más tranquilo, continúa:{/n} «Tema suficientemente debatido. No hablemos más de esto».
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Medineh hesitates before answering, his face slowly turning purple with anger.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}he grits out through his teeth.{/n} "I know who you are. I have heard of your... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}'exploits.'{/d} And I will not allow a stranger — let alone another Rogue Trader — to speak to me in such a manner and make demands of a subject of His Lordship Calligos Winterscale!" {n}He takes a breath and continues in a calmer tone,{/n} "The matter is closed. Let us speak no more of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}El gobernador Medineh titubea antes de responder. Su rostro, iracundo, enrojece hasta quedar morado.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}...». {n}Masculla apretando los dientes.{/n} «Sé quién es. He oído hablar de sus... "proezas". ¡Pero no permitiré que un{mf||a} desconocid{mf|o|a}, por muy Comerciante Independiente que sea, me hable en ese tono y presente exigencias a un súbdito de mi señor Calligos Winterscale!». {n}Respira profundamente y, en tono más tranquilo, continua:{/n} «Tema suficientemente debatido. No hablemos más de esto».

languages.text: {n}メディネ総督は応える前に少し逡巡した。その顔は、徐々に怒りで紫色に染まっていく。{/n}「陛下…」{n}彼は歯を食いしばりながら言葉を紡いだ。{/n}「あなたが何者であるかは存じています。あなたの…{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}『功績』{/d}は聞き及んでいます。ですが、見知らぬ者が…まして他の自由開拓者が…カリゴス・ウィンタースケール閣下の臣下たる私にそのような物言いをし、何かを求めることは許せることではない！」{n}彼は一息に言い切ってから、落ち着いた口調で続けた。{/n}「話は終わりです。これ以上話すことはありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Medineh hesitates before answering, his face slowly turning purple with anger.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}he grits out through his teeth.{/n} "I know who you are. I have heard of your... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}'exploits.'{/d} And I will not allow a stranger — let alone another Rogue Trader — to speak to me in such a manner and make demands of a subject of His Lordship Calligos Winterscale!" {n}He takes a breath and continues in a calmer tone,{/n} "The matter is closed. Let us speak no more of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}メディネ総督は応える前に少し逡巡した。その顔は、徐々に怒りで紫色に染まっていく。{/n}「陛下…」{n}彼は歯を食いしばりながら言葉を紡いだ。{/n}「あなたが何者であるかは存じています。あなたの…”功績”は聞き及んでいます。ですが、見知らぬ者が…まして他の自由開拓者が…カリゴス・ウィンタースケール閣下の臣下たる私にそのような物言いをし、何かを求めることは許せることではない！」{n}彼は一息に言い切ってから、落ち着いた口調で続けた。{/n}「話は終わりです。これ以上話すことはありません」

languages.text: {n}Le gouverneur Medineh hésite avant de répondre, les traits déformés par la rage.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie... {n}parvient-il à articuler entre ses dents serrées.{/n} Je sais qui vous êtes. J'ai entendu parler de vos... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}"exploits"{/d}... et je ne laisserai pas {mf|un étranger|une étrangère}, et encore moins {mf|un autre libre-marchand|une autre libre-marchande}, me parler sur ce ton et donner des ordres à un sujet de Sa Seigneurie Calligos Winterscale ! » {n}Il prend une grande inspiration avant de poursuivre d'une voix plus calme :{/n} « Le sujet est clos. N'en parlons plus. »
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Medineh hesitates before answering, his face slowly turning purple with anger.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}he grits out through his teeth.{/n} "I know who you are. I have heard of your... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}'exploits.'{/d} And I will not allow a stranger — let alone another Rogue Trader — to speak to me in such a manner and make demands of a subject of His Lordship Calligos Winterscale!" {n}He takes a breath and continues in a calmer tone,{/n} "The matter is closed. Let us speak no more of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le gouverneur Medineh hésite avant de répondre, les traits déformés par la rage.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie... {n}parvient-il à articuler entre ses dents serrées.{/n} Je sais qui vous êtes. J'ai entendu parler de vos... "exploits" et je ne laisserai pas {mf|un étranger|une étrangère}, et encore moins {mf|un autre libre-marchand|une autre libre-marchande}, me parler sur ce ton et donner des ordres à un sujet de Sa Seigneurie Calligos Winterscale ! » {n}Il prend une grande inspiration avant de poursuivre d'une voix plus calme :{/n} « Le sujet est clos. N'en parlons plus. »

languages.text: {n}Gouverneur Medineh zögert, ehe er antwortet. Sein Gesicht wird langsam puterrot vor Zorn.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ..."{n}, presst er aus zusammengebissenen Zähnen hervor.{/n} "Ich weiß, wer Ihr seid. Ich habe von Euren ... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}'Erfolgen'{/d} gehört. Und ich gestatte {mf|keinem|keiner} Fremden – schon gar {mf|keinem anderen Freihändler|keiner anderen Freihändlerin} – so mit mir zu sprechen und Forderungen an einen Untertan seiner Lordschaft Calligos Winterzunder zu stellen!" {n}Er atmet tief durch und fährt in ruhigerem Ton fort:{/n} "Die Angelegenheit ist abgeschlossen. Sprechen wir nicht mehr davon."
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Medineh hesitates before answering, his face slowly turning purple with anger.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}he grits out through his teeth.{/n} "I know who you are. I have heard of your... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}'exploits.'{/d} And I will not allow a stranger — let alone another Rogue Trader — to speak to me in such a manner and make demands of a subject of His Lordship Calligos Winterscale!" {n}He takes a breath and continues in a calmer tone,{/n} "The matter is closed. Let us speak no more of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Gouverneur Medineh zögert, ehe er antwortet. Sein Gesicht wird langsam puterrot vor Zorn.{/n} "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ..."{n}, presst er aus zusammengebissenen Zähnen hervor.{/n} "Ich weiß, wer Ihr seid. Ich habe von Euren ... 'Erfolgen' gehört. Und ich gestatte {mf|keinem|keiner} Fremden — schon gar {mf|keinem anderen Freihändler|keiner anderen Freihändlerin} — so mit mir zu sprechen und Forderungen an einen Untertan seiner Lordschaft Calligos Winterzunder zu stellen!" {n}Er atmet tief durch und fährt in ruhigerem Ton fort:{/n} "Die Angelegenheit ist abgeschlossen. Sprechen wir nicht mehr davon."

languages.text: {n}Vali Medineh, yanıt vermeden önce tereddüt ediyor. Yüzü öfkeden yavaş yavaş morarmaya başlıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri," {n}diyor sıktığı dişleri arasından.{/n} "Kim olduğunuzu biliyorum. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}'Başarılarınız'{/d} kulağıma çalındı lakin bir yabancının, hele ki başka bir Hür Tacir'in benimle bu şekilde konuşmasına ve Lord Calligos Winterscale Hazretleri'nin bir kulundan talepte bulunmasına müsaade etmem!" {n}Soluklanıp sakin bir tonla devam ediyor.{/n} "Konu kapanmıştır. Bu hususta daha fazla konuşmayalım."
languages.original_text: {n}Governor Medineh hesitates before answering, his face slowly turning purple with anger.{/n} "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}..." {n}he grits out through his teeth.{/n} "I know who you are. I have heard of your... {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Shame}'exploits.'{/d} And I will not allow a stranger — let alone another Rogue Trader — to speak to me in such a manner and make demands of a subject of His Lordship Calligos Winterscale!" {n}He takes a breath and continues in a calmer tone,{/n} "The matter is closed. Let us speak no more of it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vali Medineh, yanıt vermeden önce tereddüt ediyor. Yüzü öfkeden yavaş yavaş morarmaya başlıyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri," {n}diyor sıktığı dişleri arasından.{/n} "Kim olduğunuzu biliyorum. 'Başarılarınız' kulağıma çalındı lakin bir yabancının, hele ki başka bir Hür Tüccar'ın benimle bu şekilde konuşmasına ve Lord Calligos Winterscale Hazretleri'nin bir kulundan talepte bulunmasına müsaade etmem!" {n}Soluklanıp sakin bir tonda devam ediyor.{/n} "Konu kapanmıştır. Bu hususta daha fazla konuşmayalım."
